main.name: Hannah
main.bio: Hello! I'm a 4th year Software Engineering student at the University of New South Wales. As a UNSW Co-op Scholar, I have undertaken internships with Atlassian and Optus, and will soon begin a new internship with CBA. At university, I was the President of the UNSW Co-op Society, and travelled to India under the New Colombo Plan Mobility Grant. In my spare time, I love to play Ultimate Frisbee and basketball, read and write, and play music.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: President of UNSW Co-op Society, CSESoc DevOps Subcommittee, UNSW Ultimate Club.
99.80 ATAR, 3rd in NSW in Information Process Technology (IPT) - Top Achievers List, School Prefect, String Ensemble Concertmaster (First Violin).

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Completed a 6 month internship with Atlassian, and continued on as a junior developer. Frontend product development on Atlassian's flagship product, Jira Software using Javascript/React and CSS.

work.title: DevOps Engineer Intern
work.description: Undertaking a 6 month placement at Optus, in the Cloud and Containers team. Working closely with the RedHat OpenShift Platform to provide support to internal Optus teams who are utilising cloud and container services.

work.title: English and Maths
work.description: Specialised one-on-one tutoring of high school level English and Mathematics.
